subject: Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mo Cassara thought he lost his job as a Hofstra assistant. Then the university hired him as the coach after his friend Tim Welsh resigned after a drunken-driving arrest.
snippet: Mo Cassara thought he lost his job as a Hofstra assistant. Then the university hired him as the coach after his friend Tim Welsh resigned after a drunken-driving arrest.
